title: Shadewood armor
summaries: Shadewood armor is an armor set consisting of the Shadewood Helmet, Shadewood Breastplate, and Shadewood Greaves.

It is crafted solely from <linked>Shadewood</linked> harvested from <linked>Crimson Trees</linked>. It acts as the Crimson counterpart to the <linked>Corruption's</linked> <linked>Ebonwood armor</linked>, which shares the same stats. Along with its counterpart, it is the most powerful <linked>Surface</linked> <linked>pre-Hardmode</linked> wooden set, though it still pales in comparison to most other armor sets. It requires 75 <linked>Shadewood</linked> to craft a full set.
Wearing a full set grants a set bonus of 1 additional defense, providing a total of 5 defense.
